hooks.command: if command -v bd >/dev/null && [ -d .beads ]; then bd sync --full 2>&1 || true; bd daemon status 2>&1 | grep -q 'commit.*push.*pull' || (bd daemon stop . 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; bd daemon start --auto-commit --auto-push --auto-pull --interval 30s 2>&1) || true; fi
if command -v bd >/dev/null && [ -d .beads ] && ! bd sync --status 2>&1 | grep -q 'Pending changes: none'; then bd sync --full 2>&1; fi
